name: Crypto Pepe Mines
description: What is the project about? CryptoPepeMines is one of the first meme click to earn of the binance smart chain. Use the best features of the Click to Earns with new features like Bonding Curve, Pepe's Blessing, Raids, among others. In Crypto Pepe Mines you can mint nfts, create your squad and earn CPM! What makes your project unique? Our project is one of the first meme coin to become a click to earn, applying advanced defi protocol technologies to achieve perfect stabilization. History of your project. CryptoPepeMines was born in June 2023, breaking new ground in the binance smart chain community by being one of the first click to earn projects to reach an ATH of 72x from its lowest price in a long time! Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are creating an aditional liquidity for our token in different dex protocols of the binance smart chain. Also, we are going to deploy our next version with incredible features for our core product. What can your token be used for? Mint NFTS and play to get rewards in CPM in CryptoPepeMines.
